text.more: Network of differentially expressed small RNAs and genes 2 days after stroke in 49 patients of the PREDICT study. Color of the node denotes WGCNA module, size of node denotes node degree (incoming and outgoing connections). Move with click and drag, zoom with scroll wheel, click on nodes for subgraph isolation and more information. Return to full network by pressing X in the upper right panel.
text.intro: Hover over node to dim non-interacting nodes, click on node to show only subnetwork. To return to whole network, use right-hand menu. Left click and drag to move. Scroll or use buttons to zoom.
text.title: Subnetwork 3-3neg

legend.nodeLabel: Genes, miRs, tRFs, tRF seeds, GO terms
